cast.overview: The true story of pianist Władysław Szpilman's experiences in Warsaw during the Nazi occupation. When the Jews of the city find themselves forced into a ghetto, Szpilman finds work playing in a café; and when his family is deported in 1942, he stays behind, works for a while as a laborer, and eventually goes into hiding in the ruins of the war-torn city.
cast.title: The Pianist

details.biography: Cezary Kosinski is a Polish film and television actor. He's a graduate from the Acting Faculty at the National Academy of Dramatic Art in Warsaw, Poland.
details.name: Cezary Kosiński
